Articles.Content:
I present to you the Hyper Tornado, actually two of them since ive built two versions of it.

I was actually watching season 3 of Sonic-X at the same time as i was building this.

Both of the version fly pretty much the same way but the newer version seems more nippy and fast.

Im going to focus on the newer version of it (wanted to show off the old one for fun).

The Hyper Tornado is very manouverable indeed and has a top speed of 220-250 m/s in low altitude (could have used my clipping of engines trick to make it fly faster). And it is very fun to fly (rolling feels maby a bit too sharp).

It was not an easy task to replicate the design of the Hyper Tornado. i just watched some episodes of Sonic-X season 3 to work as my reference for the build. the design is very rounded and has a lot of parts that are impossible to replicate properly with stock parts.

I ended up making the new version fully stock except for prosedural wings and Flag decals.

Here are some picks of it in action.

Here are a couple of picks of the original version built quite a long time ago.

My original version just didnt feel accurate enough to put it here on to the forum plus it uses a lot more mods.

And yes i ended up clipping the wingtip while i flew past the flagpole.

So there you have it folks and fans, the Hyper Tornado. It still isnt perfect but it will have to do for now. I hope you enjoy it .

Mods used:

Improved version: Prosedural wings and Flag decals

Old version: KAX expansion, Prosedural landing-gears and Firespitter

Download link for the new version: https://www.dropbox.com/s/p3zexewp5jcinxa/Hyper%20Tornado%20%28improved%29.craft?dl=0
